item.title: Taskkill is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @brwn brwn
item.description:
@brwn wrote:

I am trying to compile and I get:
‘Taskkill is not recognized as an internal or external command’

Here is my compile server.bat

@echo off
taskkill /F /IM java.exe
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03
ant
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Taskkill is not recognized as an internal or external command
